issue.message: Call requires permission which may be rejected by user: code should explicitly check to see if permission is available (with checkPermission) or explicitly handle a potential SecurityException
issue.errorLine1: String deviceName = device.getName() != null ? device.getName() : "未知设备";
issue.explanation: The code calls a method that requires a permission. The code should explicitly check to see if the permission is available (with checkPermission) or explicitly handle a potential SecurityException.
issue.errorLine1: String deviceName = device.getName() != null ? device.getName() : "未知设备";
